trans-unit.source: Specifies the default binding property for a component.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute> is specified at the class level.
It can be inherited and does not allow multiple attributes on the same class.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/30386922-1e00-4602-9ebf-526b271a8b87).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute"></xref> class using no parameters.
The default constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute.Name%2A> property to `null`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute"></xref> class using the specified property name.
This constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute.Name%2A> property to the value of the `name` parameter.
The name of the default binding property.
Represents the default value for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute.Default> member is a static, read-only field that defines an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute> class initialized with the default constructor.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute"></xref> instance.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute.Equals%2A> method returns `true` if the value of the `obj` parameter is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute.Name%2A> properties of the two objects are equal.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute"></xref> instance
`true` if the object is equal to the current instance; otherwise, `false`, indicating they are not equal.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Gets the name of the default binding property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute"></xref> is bound.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute.Name%2A> property is set in the constructor.
The name of the default binding property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute"></xref> is bound.
